name: obsidian-auto-filename
description: Auto Filename is an Obsidian.md plugin that automatically renames files in Obsidian based on the first x characters of the file, saving you time and effort.

scripts.build: tsc -noEmit -skipLibCheck && node esbuild.config.mjs production && node postbuild-script.js
scripts.release: node version-bump.mjs && tsc -noEmit -skipLibCheck && node esbuild.config.mjs production && node postbuild-script.js

author: rcsaquino
